title: Unpopular opinion: the majority of Xerath players use scripts (and he needs a rework because of it)

replies.body:
Video? 
Where are you getting those stats from?
Are you sure it was a script and not you refusing to dodge?
If they were scripting, it means they'd hit everything always and dodge everything always. How were they in low elo doing that?

This is a strange misconception, scripting does not actually give those abilities.

Anything a script can do, a real serverside bot can do more easily; note how predictable the instant reactions and casts of bots in AI games are.

Nobody accuses bots of having OP aim and dodging abilities.
what a surprise all the scripters downvoting me

Get mad, stay mad.

Clearly anyone who disagrees with you is a scripter, despite all evidence to the contrary.

anyways personal experience, I said of the last 10 xeraths I faced on this account and my other account 9 were clearly scripting.

yah I know, scripts are hard to spot sometimes but on Xerath they are painfully obvious.
Are you still alive? https://www.twitch.tv/videos/552080590 am i scripter 10/10 god i hate my voice lol

Why on earth would any Xerath player script? It would probably be a disadvantage to him, considering his kit and how scripting actually works.

Disclaimer: I am an experienced programmer that understands how pathfinding, AI and automation of that sort works, scripting is not the "instant max skill" cheat that people seem to think it is. You have to be A; really bad, or B; playing very specific champions to get any benefit from automation.

It sounds like someone wrecked you. Maybe work on improving instead of shitposting.
